Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v3 (Environment Properties)
Workflow.Description: This flow retrieves Environment properties information when an environment is created. This flow retrieves add-on and capacity for environments, and security role information (e.g. environment admins). This information is retrieved from the Power Platform admin connector and from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment.
